title: Loss of LP FOR NO REASON AT ALL!!!!
body: For some reason my league will just randomly close out or crash during champ select resulting in unfair LP loss and time penalty.. Ive lost maybe about 2 divisions worth of LP already and about 5 hours of my time wasted due to this bug and yet it still has to be fixed..It just happened to me again and I am starting to get really freaking tired of it..

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs?  Some have been known to crash out during champion select or even opening hextech crafting.  If you have any running like play.tv or overwolf remove them.  Let me know if that helps!
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
guess im not alone :') also keeps dc during champ select or when trying to ban a champ , even got demoted because of it {{item:3070}}
